mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, board.* from (select * from board order by NUM desc) board) where rnum >= 1 and rnum <=5
select count(*) from BOARD WHERE category = '자유'
select count(*) from BOARD WHERE category = '유머'
mapper.insert: insert into "BOARD" (num, category, title, writer, regdate, views, content) values (BOARD_SEQ.nextval, #{category}, #{title}, #{writer}, SYSDATE, 0, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET views = views + 1 WHERE num = #{num}
